div.p: Alim Agro is a leading name in Bangladesh‚Äôs poultry sector, dedicated to excellence in integrated farming. We combine advanced technology with ethical husbandry to ensure food security and sustainable agriculture.
Founded with a vision to revolutionize the poultry industry, growing from a local farm into a multifunctional agricultural powerhouse serving nationwide markets with quality products.
To be the industry benchmark through innovation, quality and sustainability in poultry farming.
To empower farmers with superior poultry products, technology and sustainable farming practices.

div.p: Explore our state-of-the-art farm, feed mill, and hatchery facilities.

These chickens are bred for rapid growth and efficient meat production, reaching market weight quickly.
These chickens are raised for their unique appearance, temperament, or show qualities rather than commercial production. They often lay fewer eggs.
